Text: Read more …  Kraft Heinz Co (NASDAQ:KHC) Director Jorge P. Lemann purchased 3,496,503 shares of the stock in a transaction that occurred on Monday, September 16th. The shares were purchased at an average cost of $28.60 per share, for a total transaction of $99,999,985.80. Following the completion of the acquisition, the director now directly owns 3,516,449 shares of the company's stock, valued at approximately $100,570,441.40.
